Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.util

Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.util.BoundingBox

  • public class BoundingBox
extends Object
    Defines the bounds of objects, such as a 3D mesh.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoundingBox​()
      Default constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance with both the minimum and maximum corner values being zero.
      BoundingBox​(Vector3 minCorner, Vector3 maxCorner)
      A constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance with the maximum and minimum corner values of the axis-aligned bounding box (AABB).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Vector3 getAabbMax​()
      Obtains the maximum corner value of the AABB.
      Vector3 getAabbMin​()
      Obtains the minimum corner value of the AABB.
      void setAabbMinMax​(Vector3 min, Vector3 max)
      Sets the minimum and maximum corner values of the AABB.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox​(Vector3 minCorner,
                   Vector3 maxCorner)
        A constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance with the maximum and minimum corner values of the axis-aligned bounding box (AABB).
        Parameters:
        minCorner - Indicates the minimum corner value of the AABB.
        maxCorner - Indicates the maximum corner value of the AABB.

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox​()
        Default constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance with both the minimum and maximum corner values being zero.
